org.agorava

Class AgoravaContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agorava.AgoravaContext

  • public class AgoravaContext
extends Object
    Class containing configuration for Agorava. Static field here are stored here from third parties helper classes.
    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String internalCallBack
      The default internal callback when whe return from OAuth connexion
      protected static String producerScope
      Scope for the producer
      static String webAbsolutePath
      The complete Web Context path (protocol, server, application context) of this Agorava Instance
